extracted_playbook.title: Use ICONICS Product Suite version 10.97.3 or later
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the ICONICS Product Suite is updated to version 10.97.3 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities CVE-2024-8299 and CVE-2024-9852.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow ICONICS Whitepaper Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the guidelines provided in the ICONICS Whitepaper on Security Vulnerabilities, November 2024 edition, for using AlarmWorX64 MMX.

extracted_playbook.condition: Which GENESIS64TM version is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply GENESIS64TM 10.97.2 Critical Fixes Rollup 3
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the Critical Fixes Rollup 3 for GENESIS64TM version 10.97.2 to mitigate CVE-2024-8300.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply GENESIS64TM 10.97.3 Critical Fixes Rollup 1
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the Critical Fixes Rollup 1 for GENESIS64TM version 10.97.3 series to mitigate CVE-2024-8300.

cve_id: Mitigations for CVE-2024-8299, CVE-2024-9852, and CVE-2024-8300
affected_products: ICONICS Product Suite versions 10.97.3 and later
